about_the_game:
Enter the Forgotten Castle!


The Forgotten Castle is an action adventure challenging game with a great dark atmosphere.

Play as an old man who wakes up in a mysterious castle full of magic and danger. Explore every corner of the castle and discover what is hidden between the walls of this misterious and ancient place while you keep fighting with monsters and improving your abilities.

Defeat the bosses guarding the castle and complete tons of puzzles to unlock new powers and abilities while you complete your quest.

Immerse yourself in this dark and beautiful retro pixel art experience.


Game Featurtes


  • 2D classical action game with the gameplay innovation of modern games. Exploration, action and puzzle solving meet in this charismatic adventure.
  • Polished 2D controls that lead to a fun and challenging experience. Game designed to be played with a controller in order to enjoy the experience at its fullest.
  • Challenging gameplay. SPOILER, you will die.
  • More than six different areas with their own style and personality. All of them full of enemies, puzzles and secrets waiting to be discovered.
  • Unlock abilities to progress through the forgotten castle. Get the ability to dash, burn things and other incredible powers.
  • Get different weapons that allow to have different strategies when it comes to fight enemies.
  • Lots of different enemies with their own style and attack patterns.
  • More than six different bosses that will be a great challenge to every player.
  • Dozens of puzzles spread around the forgotten castle. Some may be easy some not. Good luck solving them all.
  • Different endings. Will you be able to see all of them?
  • Retro pixel art style that evokes classical games like Zelda or Final Fantasy.
  • Dark and strong soundtrack with themes for each area and situation.
